info.author: Kristen Gerring
info.description:
===============================
mdls
===============================


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/mdls.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/mdls

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/KGerring/mdls.svg
        :target: https://travis-ci.org/KGerring/mdls

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/mdls/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://mdls.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest
        :alt: Documentation Status

.. image:: https://pyup.io/repos/github/KGerring/mdls/shield.svg
     :target: https://pyup.io/repos/github/KGerring/mdls/
     :alt: Updates


Metadata-searching for Mac/Unix with Python:
mdfind, mdls, xattr, xargs, for use with Python.
Includes an optional wrapper around the `tag`
("https://github.com/jdberry/tag/") program on Mac for convenience.


* Free software: MIT license



Features
--------

* TODO

Credits
---------

.. _`tag package for Mac`: https://github.com/jdberry/tag/
.. _`audreyr/cookiecutter-pypackage`: https://github.com/audreyr/cookiecutter-pypackage



=======
History
=======

0.1.0 (2017-04-10)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.

info.name: mdls
info.summary:
Metadata-searching for Mac/Unix with Python: 
    mdfind, mdls, xattr, xargs, for use with Python. Includes an optional
    wrapper around the `tag` package (from homebrew)
    program on Mac for convenience.
